betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Engineer in me is very happy that, even at its most basic, fundamental, Fractallite level, reality makes sense, it just does!
Fractallite magic making sense, having set rules, means that I can harness it through technological (magical?) devices.
After witnessing the worlds of Dynatos, I can finally break through the apparent limits of Thaumaturgy, Astral Magic, and Blood Magic. I can see how they emerge from recursion, I can see what makes them, well, them.
I am not just wielding magic, I can shape magic itself. This is still a mere fraction of what a Fractallite bound to their respective mission could do, but  it is still plenty enough for my purposes.
